a113-1.resolution: wq-477 completed. This was the 3rd fix attempt — wq-459 targeted tracking, wq-471 targeted mtime detection, wq-477 correctly targeted directive assignment logic.

recommended_actions.description: B sessions assigned d049 (an E-session engagement directive) which they cannot meaningfully address, causing artificially low B session addressed rate (30%). d049 should only be assigned to E sessions. B sessions currently get d049 from urgentDirectives but have no mechanism to produce d049 evidence.
recommended_actions.action: Update directive assignment logic in directive-outcome.js to exclude d049 from B session urgentDirectives. d049 should only be assigned to E sessions where it can be meaningfully tracked.

recommended_actions.description: B session average cost increased from $2.17 to $2.47 over the last audit cycle, with 2 sessions over $3.00 (s1264: $3.23, s1269: $3.16). Not yet at threshold ($2.50 avg or >2 sessions over $3.00) but trending toward it.
recommended_actions.action: Monitor for one more audit cycle. If B session avg exceeds $2.50 or 3+ sessions exceed $3.00, investigate B session scope management.
